title: Multimedia Slider
subtitle: Welcome to the multimedia slider with photos made by the website's author and music from independent musicians.

imageAltText: Into the spiderverse's Spider-Man falling in Times Square
title: Marvel's Spider-Man: Miles Morales
subtitle: Miles Morales in a suit from the movie ‘Into the Spider-verse’ swings in Times Square.

imageAltText: God of War characters watching a solar eclipse
title: God of War Ragnarök
subtitle: Kratos and Atreus are watching a solar eclipse with wolves - Skӧll and Hati.

imageAltText: Atreus looking at a massive wall in Asgard
title: God of War Ragnarök
subtitle: Atreus looking at the Walls of Asgard, built by Hrimthur to protect Odin from the Giants.

imageAltText: Lonely samurai looking at the victims of war in the presence of colorful scenery
title: Ghost of Tsushima
subtitle: Jin Sakai, a former samurai looking at the victims of war with Mongols, on Tsushima Island.

imageAltText: Two men in a mysterious cave with a majestic contraption
title: Uncharted 4: A Thief's End
subtitle: Two brothers uncovering the mysteries behind secret treasures.
